title: Nanopool Official
author: Nanopool Official
created_time: June 05, 2022, 11:57:14 AMLast edit: December 16, 2023, 10:35:54 AM by Nanopool Official
content: Nanopool.orgWelcome to mining pool - Nanopool.org  Nanopool is a trusted and secure mining pool from past 7 years and well known brand in the crypto mining world. Supported Coins Zephyr [ZEPH] - http://zeph.nanopool.orgIronfish [IRON] - http://iron.nanopool.orgKaspa [KAS] - http://kaspa.nanopool.orgEthereum PoW [ETHW] - http://ethw.nanopool.orgEthereum Classic [ETC] - http://etc.nanopool.org Raven [RVN] - https://rvn.nanopool.orgMonero [XMR] - http://xmr.nanopool.orgConflux [CFX]- http://cfx.nanopool.orgErgo [ERG] - http://ergo.nanopool.orgFeatures Own mining software Nanominer  Detailed statistics and API  1% fee   PPLNS  Europe, Asia, US servers  No KYC  DDOS protection  24/7 support Over the past year, we have added 3 new coins to our pool!Now we support Zephyr, Ironfish and Kaspa mining!With EXTRA reward paid each block!!! Get 5% more coinsZephyProtocol mining pool address:http://zeph.nanopool.org PROMOTION at the start of the pool! The reward for each block of the first 1000 found has been increased by 1 ZEPH (8.4% bonus to the block value)Confirmation: 100 blocksReward distribution: 240Min PPLNSCommission: 1%Minimum payout amount: 0.1 ZEPHSupported connections: StratumSupport for SSL connectionsPossibility to mine on an exchange walletIronFish mining pool address:http://iron.nanopool.orgPROMOTION at the start of the pool! The reward for each block of the first 6000 found has been increased by 1 IRON (5% bonus to the block value)Confirmation: 10 blocksReward distribution: 360Min PPLNSCommission: 1%Minimum payout: 0.05 IRONSupported connections: StratumSupport for SSL connectionsPossibility to mine on an exchange walletKaspa mining pool address:http://kaspa.nanopool.orgConfirmation: 100 blocksReward distribution: 60Min PPLNSCommission: 1%Minimum payout: 50 KASSupported connections: StratumSupport for SSL connectionsPossibility to mine on an exchange walletUsefull linksTwitter - https://twitter.com/nanopool_org Discord - https://discord.gg/5rKjfthTXcTelegram ANN - https://t.me/NanoAnnEnTechnical support - https://help.nanopool.org/hc/en-usWe very much welcome feedback and suggestions to improve our service.
